com.tictactoe3d.game

Class Minimax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tictactoe3d.game.MinimaxGame

  • public class Minimax
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the minimax algorithm which is used by the computer to calculate its next move against the player.
    Author:
    Prateek Mathur

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] bestMove
      An int array that contains the bestMove for this state.
      private char[][] boardArray
      The 2D array that holds the board state for this instance.

    • Field Detail

      • boardArray

        private char[][] boardArray
        The 2D array that holds the board state for this instance.

      • bestMove

        private int[] bestMove
        An int array that contains the bestMove for this state. Contains 2 elements- [bestRow, bestCol]

    • Constructor Detail

        The public constructor for Minimax. Accepts a string representation of the boardState, and uses it initialize the boardArray for this instance.
        Parameters:
        boardString -

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public Board play()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the minimax algorithm on the boardArray. This method should be called only after the boardArray is initialized, or it will throw an Exception.
        Returns:
        A board object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • convertBoardTo2D

        private static char[][] convertBoardTo2D(java.lang.String boardString)
        Initializes the boardArray for this instance using the boardString.
        Parameters:
        boardString - A string representing the current board State
        Returns:
        boardArray A 2D array generated from the board State

      • minimax

        private int minimax(char player)
        Minimax implementation This is a recursive implementation for Minimax.
        Parameters:
        player - A char representing whose turn it is
        Returns:
        bestScore The best score for the player who is playing

      • getMoves

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> getMoves()
        Finds and returns a list of all possible next board states for a given state
        Returns:
        allMoves An ArrayList of int arrays, containing the [row, col] of the next state

      • hasWon

        private boolean hasWon(char player)
        Checks weather a player has won the game or not, by finding possible winning combinations in the board.
        Parameters:
        player - Player whose victory needs to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the player has won, false otherwise

      • evaluateScore

        private int evaluateScore()
        A deterministic evaluation function for Minimax. Returns +1 if computer wins. Returns -1 if player wins. Returns 0 if game is not over yet, or ends in a draw.
        Returns:
        The appropriate score
